welcome_message_body: Welcome to Nishitokyo, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, rich history, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this wonderful city has to offer during your visit. Welcome!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yokota AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Haneda Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a valid email address is required to access it.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
